nodes.text: Ziro the Hutt's criminal organization was a criminal syndicate led by the gangster Ziro Desilijic Tiure on Coruscant. The G9 Rigger-class light freighter Twilight was part of Ziro's operation, and his most trusted assassin was IG-86 sentinel droid KRONOS-327. During the Clone Wars, Ziro allied with Count Dooku's Confederacy of Independent Systems and helped in the kidnapping of Rotta the Huttlet. Eventually, however, this resulted in the Coruscant Guard raiding his palace and arresting him.
